mutants.code:
import re

def to_snake_case(name):
    name = re.sub('', '\\1_\\2', name)
    name = re.sub('([a-z0-9])([A-Z])', '\\1_\\2', name)
    name = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '_', name)
    name = re.sub('\\s+', '_', name)
    name = name.lower()
    return name

import re

def to_snake_case(name):
    name = re.sub('(.)([A-Z][a-z]+)', '', name)
    name = re.sub('([a-z0-9])([A-Z])', '\\1_\\2', name)
    name = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '_', name)
    name = re.sub('\\s+', '_', name)
    name = name.lower()
    return name
